name: Robobo TM
description:
Help recover Time Realm.

Shoot Time Gears and stop time before it runs out.

Unfroze those trapped in time to get some help.

Catch all Time Bugs.

This is a short top down shooter game that resembles hack-slash aestetic. On the control of the little robot, Robobo, shoot Wandering Numbers, Time Gears to stop time, before its runs out. If you can, save all those frozen in time. Explore all the 8 stages.

- Move, shoot, react, discover and stop time to restore time flow.

- 8 levels to open and explore.
